properties.entry: select * from sc_fba_inbound_plan where 1=1 {@ and account_id = '#accountId#'} order by order_no desc
select sfilp.*, (select IN_NUMBER from sc_warehouse_in s where s.id = sfilp.in_id) as IN_NUMBER from sc_fba_inbound_local_plan sfilp where 1=1 {@ and sfilp.account_id = '#accountId#'}
select * from sc_fba_inbound_local_plan_items where 1=1 and plan_id = '{@#planId#}'

INSERT INTO sc_fba_inbound_local_plan ( PLAN_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, LABEL_PREP_TYPE, NAME, ADDRESS_LINE1, ADDRESS_LINE2, DISTRICT_OR_COUNTY, CITY, STATE_OR_PROVINCE_CODE, COUNTRY_CODE, POSTAL_CODE, CREATE_DATE, CREATOR, SHIPMENT_TYPE, IS_PARTNERED, CARRIER_NAME, IN_ID ) VALUES ( '{@#planId#}', '{@#accountId#}', '{@#labelPrepType#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#addressLine1#}', '{@#addressLine2#}', '{@#districtOrCounty#}', '{@#city#}', '{@#stateOrProvinceCode#}', '{@#countryCode#}', '{@#postalCode#}', NOW(), '{@#loginId#}', '{@#shipmentType#}', '{@#isPartnered#}', '{@#carrierName#}', '{@#inId#}' )

UPDATE sc_fba_inbound_local_plan SET ACCOUNT_ID = '{@#accountId#}' , LABEL_PREP_TYPE = '{@#labelPrepType#}' , NAME = '{@#name#}' , ADDRESS_LINE1 = '{@#addressLine1#}' , ADDRESS_LINE2 = '{@#addressLine2#}' , DISTRICT_OR_COUNTY = '{@#districtOrCounty#}' , CITY = '{@#city#}' , STATE_OR_PROVINCE_CODE = '{@#stateOrProvinceCode#}' , COUNTRY_CODE = '{@#countryCode#}' , POSTAL_CODE = '{@#postalCode#}' , SHIPMENT_TYPE='{@#shipmentType#}', IS_PARTNERED='{@#isPartnered#}', CARRIER_NAME='{@#carrierName#}' WHERE PLAN_ID = '{@#planId#}'
INSERT INTO sc_fba_inbound_plan_items (ACCOUNT_ID, SHIPMENT_ID, SELLER_SKU, QUANTITY ) VALUES ('{@#accountId#}', '{@#shipmentId#}', '{@#sku#}', '{@#quantity#}' )
select * from sc_fba_inbound_plan_items WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = '{@#accountId#}' and SHIPMENT_ID = '{@#shipmentId#}' and SELLER_SKU = '{@#sku#}'
UPDATE sc_fba_inbound_plan_items SET QUANTITY = '{@#quantity#}' WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = '{@#accountId#}' and SHIPMENT_ID = '{@#shipmentId#}' and SELLER_SKU = '{@#sku#}'

INSERT INTO sc_fba_inbound_local_plan_items (ITEM_ID, PLAN_ID, SKU, QUANTITY, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, MEMO ) VALUES ('{@#itemId#}', '{@#planId#}', '{@#sku#}', '{@#quantity#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#memo#}' )
UPDATE sc_fba_inbound_local_plan_items SET SKU = '{@#sku#}' , QUANTITY = '{@#quantity#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' WHERE ITEM_ID = '{@#itemId#}'
